content.raw:
```
amigo@amigo-P50 $ glxinfo | head -5
name of display: :0
display: :0  screen: 0
direct rendering: Yes
server glx vendor string: NVIDIA Corporation
server glx version string: 1.4
```

I have to say I had just installed Cuda 10.1 and didn’t reboot before opening gazebo. Now after a reboot this is the output:

```
amigo@amigo-P50 $ gazebo --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.16.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.16.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.130
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.130
[Err] [RTShaderSystem.cc:489] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.[Err] [Server.cc:383] Could not open file[worlds/empty.world]
[Wrn] [Server.cc:342] Falling back on worlds/empty.world
[Err] [Server.cc:383] Could not open file[worlds/empty.world]
[Err] [RTShaderSystem.cc:489] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.
```

However, I am again able to run gazebo by a desktop file and gazebo\_ros after the reboot.

amigo@amigo-P50 $ glxinfo | head -5
name of display: :0
display: :0  screen: 0
direct rendering: Yes
server glx vendor string: NVIDIA Corporation
server glx version string: 1.4

I have to say I had just installed Cuda 10.1 and didn’t reboot before opening gazebo. Now after a reboot this is the output:

amigo@amigo-P50 $ gazebo --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.16.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 7.16.0

[Err] [RTShaderSystem.cc:489] Unable to find shader lib. Shader generating will fail.[Err] [Server.cc:383] Could not open file[worlds/empty.world]

However, I am again able to run gazebo by a desktop file and gazebo_ros after the reboot.
